Class QuestionTest

java.lang.Object
application.QuestionTest
public class QuestionTest extends Object
Question Test JUnit JavaDoc This JUnit test cases tests the Question class and the methods within it. testGetQuestionId: Pass, testSetQuestionId: Pass, testGetText: Pass, testGetUser: Pass, testGetSolution: Pass, testIsResolved: Pass, testUpdate1: Pass, testUpdate2: Pass, testSetSolution: Pass, testRemoveSolution: Pass
